Headline: #87 87th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 91st/Brandon
ShortDescription: 87 87th and 26 South Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 91st/Brandon, due to street blockage near 91st/Brandon.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#87 87th and #26 South Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 91st/Brandon, due to street blockage near 91st/Brandon.

Westbound #87 87th buses will operate via 91st, Baltimore, 90th, Houston and over regular route.

Northbound #26 South Shore Express buses will operate via 91st, Baltimore, 90th, Houston and over regular route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Northbound Reroute near Cicero/18th
ShortDescription: Northbound 54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, 16th, Kostner, Roosevelt and Cicero: due to, street blockage near Cicero/18th.

How will this affect my trip?

Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Southbound Reroute near Halsted/77th
ShortDescription: Southbound #8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 76th, Racine, 79th and Halsted, due to fire department activity near Halsted/77th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 76th, Racine, 79th, then resume their normal route on Halsted, due to fire department activity near Halsted/77th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line  trains are running with wait times of up to 30 minutes; we're working to restore service. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line  trains are running, but with extended wait times. Some riders may experience wait times of up to 30 minutes while our crews work to restore regular service levels.

Use trackers to look for live arrival information and consider available alternatives, such a local bus routes or buses to/from other 'L' lines.

Allow extra travel time.
